EmailTemplate.description: To be used for resetting Markit Hub password only
EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub Password reset
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub Password reset
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
Please use the below link to reset your password using our self-service process - https://www.markithub.com/hub/PasswordResetRequest.ppg
Your username is: {!Case.ContactEmail__c}
Your password must be at least eight characters long and include: - one upper case letter - one lower case letter - one number - one symbol.
Please ensure you delete your cookies, history and cache before resetting your password and avoid using auto fill functionality; instead manually type your username.
All correspondence in relation to your Markit Hub account will be sent to the email address registered to your profile, {!Case.ContactEmail__c}.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
